title: How to fix PowerDirector cache error - Quora

response.answer_text: Seems that this question was asked in a forum… "Error making movie" "Can not produce the cache file" nothing worked, but I found the solution! I started windows in safe mode: and the film rendered perfectly in avchd 1920-1080 24Mbps; looking better than ever before! I am the happiest man on earth!!! Thanks for your support, Dafydd. Thanks to you I realized it was just a power-issue, so I could come up with the real solution. So of course my next step will be to buy a better & bigger pc. "Error making movie" "Can not produce the cache file"
Maybe your cache is full: fix PowerDirector cache error at DuckDuckGo
